alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 2:03PM MDT until August 03 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Dakota, including the following areas, Bennett, Butte, Central Black Hills, Custer Co Plains, Fall River, Haakon, Harding, Hermosa Foot Hills, Jackson, Mellette, Northern Black Hills, Northern Foot Hills, Northern Meade Co Plains, Oglala Lakota, Pennington Co Plains, Perkins, Rapid City, Southern Black Hills, Southern Foot Hills, Southern Meade Co Plains, Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, Todd, Tripp and Ziebach. Portions of Wyoming, including the following areas, Northeastern Crook, Northern Campbell, Southern Campbell, Western Crook, Weston and Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Scattered showers and thunderstorms are expected to produce heavy rainfall across the area through the weekend. Two to five inches of rain is possible in a short period of time. Runoff from this heavy rainfall may lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
